title: 22 - A Deep Talk about Holiness with Jackie Hill Perry
description:
You're some of the first to hear my friend Jackie talk about holiness. We're getting deep today about how God is holy and what it means for our lives. There's no better person to have this convo with than Jackie.

You'll love the Dwell App: dwellapp.io/jennie

Jackie's new book about Holiness comes out in August 2021!
